pages.text: Engineer's Decor is a decorative mod that adds industrial-style blocks and functional machines to Minecraft. $(br2)Perfect for building immersive factories, workshops, and labs.
Start by crafting Small Lab Furnaces for compact smelting. $(br2)Build metal framework, treated wood planks, and concrete blocks for your factory builds.

Add functional machines like the Electric Lantern and Factory Hopper, or upgrade your smelting setup with the Enhanced Blast Furnace Preheater. $(br2)Create immersive industrial environments with Engineer's Decor!
